overview: Having abandoned the BDSM lifestyle after her inability to accept that she wasn’t “normal,” Sydney finds herself desperately missing it. Unable to dive right back in, she decides to write her thesis on BDSM and the pursuit of abnormal sex. Her research includes interviewing three women in the lifestyle. But, as Sydney delves deeper into the lives of these women, she finds herself longing to return to her role as a submissive.
tagline: When you can't deny your past, do what excites you.
title: Darker Side of Desire 2
